11511122.content:
You're nearly knocked unconscious by your fellow captives landing on your body, but you managed to shield yourself with your hands and slowly drag yourself from the panicky, struggling mass of humanity and stare at your surroundings.

Currently you all occupy a large glass tank with a relatively soft floor--but given the wailing and keening of the others as they seem to know where they are, it apparently wasn't a good place.

"Here you are, Mr. Jared," the booming voice of the fox who caught you snaps your head up to look at him. You notice for the first time that he's young, probably not halfway through his teens.

Great, you think ,I was captured for some kid's afterschool job--but for what?

The answer comes horrifically too soon, "excellent job, Micky," the owner of the voice is an elderly bear who hands the fox a wad of cash and then looks down into your tank with an uncomfortably predatory grin, "these humans are all the right age and condition for the optimimum flavor."

You feel cold terror at the last part, and it is then that you spy a cardboard sign outside your tank, reading its message sends a tremor through your body.

"Humans: $.99 apiece, $10.00 a dozen".

At least you're going for a good deal.

This--is a candy shop, you decide, noticing the various sweets and flavorings--probably to make your kind taste better, you think with a shudder.

A loud virbation thunders through the air and realize that "Micky" has left and "Mr. Jared" is now behind a cash regsiter the size of a large house awaiting business.

And business is good today, it seems, as the door soon opens and in steps...
11511122.title: Willy Wonka's this ain't.

115111221.content:
They enter the store in the usual tight-packed group that human girls usually form when hanging out in malls or at school.

Four vulpine females, one black like the last fox you saw, one snowy white, and the remaining two are red and silvery gray, all looking to be somewhere between high school senior and college sophmore in age.

"Good day, ladies," the shop owner smiles, "what can I do for you?"

The dark furred one is the obvious leader both from her stance and her commanding tone as she saunters up to the counter your tank rests on.

She stares directly at you, or so it seems, and licks her lips, "the usual, Richard. Two dozen." The others like visibly thrilled so it's likely she plans to share with them...

A net appears from nowhere to scoop through the crowd before they can scatter.They cry out in surprise and fear as they fall into the mesh that changes direction and sweeps towards you.

Your first impulse is to run, but then with a sad moment of rationality you realize it's hopeless and just wait--not for long.

Once again you experience the oh-so-familiar sensation of being snatched up with a large undistingishable mass of victims--but it's worse this time.

Last time you had no idea what the intention was, but this time you do. You feverently wish for this to turn out to be a dream, but the brown paper sack you're dumped into.

For a moment everything is dark and settled--then the world shakes and begins to move as the vixen leaves the store with her purchase.

Darkness. Well, not completely. Occassionally light would spill in to the paper prison, along with an eager pawlike hand that would snatch one or two hollering "candies" and lift them out like in a bad alien abduction movie.

This goes on for fifteen minutes--at which point there's now enough room for everyone to spread, making it harder to be grabbed and the foxgirls seem to be satisfied for a moment.

Suddenly everything stops and you recognize the voice as the leader says, "okay, Kate, we'll see you tomorrow in class."

"Thanks, Patty," comes a soft alto reply--where you not currently in a terrified state expecting to be eaten at any second you would have found the voice alluring.

A moment of silence passes, then Patty says quickly, "wait! Don't you want a snack? You didn't have ANY on the way here!"

More long silence, "well, I--dunno, never eaten live food before," quickly the others chime in, encouraging Kate to have a human, claiming that "they're really good."

Finally she sighs in agreement, "sure why not?" She says, "mother also told me to try new foods."

Yeah and my mother always told me not to eat anything with a face, you want to snort bitterly. Without warning the world tips sideways and down as you and the remainder of the bag's contents slide out into the waiting, cupped palms of Patty.

There's only about seven left, you notice with regret, glancing around at the other foxes, the rest were being digested.

"Go ahead and take a few," the one being addressed is the gray fox. She has long, white hair and striking green eyes. Her body is--modestly pretty--medium sized bust with long, slender thighs and legs.

"That's okay, I'm not that hungry," she replies. "I--think I'll just take one."

With that her forefinger and thumb reach towards the humans in Patty's hands, filling your entire vision.

Still underwater, you swim beneath the humongous group in the water. You turn over, your back towards the sand below. Perfect, you're still undetected! You open your mouth, taking large gulps of the briny water.
Without warning, hundreds of furs begin to be sucked down into a whirlpool ending in your hungry maw. Their screams are drowned out by the loud music. Two hundred furs and a considerable amount of seawater flow into your belly without anyone onshore noticing, they're much to caught up in their music. Within a few seconds, another hundred furs are forced down your throat and into your gullet. You then silently raise above the water. In the darkness, nobody sees you. The area once filled with swimmers is now empty. You put a giant paw to your still firm abs, disappointed with the lack of bulge. Your belly feels like it's full of bees as the three hundred furs inside struggle and digest.
The lead singer onstage stops singing and gasps in horror as you step onto the beach.
With a swoop of your arm you grab the entire bad and drop them into your maw. Placing a hand on your abs, you belch loudly, filling the air with the smell of brine and juices digesting hundreds of people.
As the crowd screams and tries to flee, you intercept them. You scoop up handful after handful of furs and shove them down your gullet at an alarming rate. Not one fur escapes your greedy gut, but even after another four hundred furs, your muscular belly shows only a hit of swelling. You growl. This isn't acceptable. You need more food!
1232.title: Devour every last person in the city

12322.content:
You stomp over the abandoned remains of the concert and on to the street. Pedestrians gawk at you. A bus driver looses control and crashes into your food. You smile wickedly and pick up the small bus. After tearing off the back hatch of the bus, your pour its contents into your maw. People on the ground scream as fifty furs fall into your mouth. You catch the hundreds of scattering pedestrians and toss them all unceremoniously into your maw. As you walk down the street, you leave an empty path, having swallowed both the pedestrians and residents of buildings alike. Building after building, you rummage through the windows until every last person inside descends into your belly. There isn't time to empty every car, so you simply toss smaller vehicles down your throat, stopping only gulp down the occupants of larger ones. This continues for a mile until you reach the cruise ship terminal. You pat your slightly swollen belly, filled with three thousand more furs from your walk.
As you approach the terminal, hundreds of furs run inside, seeking shelter. You laugh as you pull the building off its foundations. You tilt the building and four hundred furs slide into your now rapidly swelling belly. Looking towards the water, you notice one ship has already left, and two others are begging to free. With a few short strides, you reach the first ship. You pull it out of the water and without hesitating, tilt it up as it's contents begin to spill into your hungry gullet. You shake the ship to loosen the few last bits of food. As the last of the three thousand passengers are stuffed into your belly, you belch again, recovering from the large amount of swelling.
A few strides later and the second ship has fallen prey to you. The passengers scream as they are dumped into your belly, causing it to ballon out further. But you want more. This is barley bigger than the belly of a fur who's had too much beer!
Within seconds you're upon the third ship. Your belly rumbles, digesting the ten thousand people stuffed inside who's struggles begin to cause you to have an orgasm. Full of lust and adrenaline, you pick the ship up out of the water and bite the bow off. You swallow it and it's occupants. You tilt the rest of the ship high above your head. Your belly swells out as the unfortunate passengers fill it, finally round in the shape of a half sphere. You pat it and then belch loudly. You lick your lips. You had decided to devour everyone in the city, and you intend to do just that.
12322.title: More food

choices: The army attacking you with some sort of ray gun.
124.content:
Seeing the towering buildings of the city really enraged you off. To the morsels, they mean achievement and greatness. But you do like one thing about them: When you destroy them, it shows that no matter what the tiny meal-furs build, you will always be above them all. So seeing an entire city of those skyscrapers made you forget your hunger in your stomach, but raised a craving in your feet and claws.

Since you want make a good first impression in this city, you decided to cause a big calamity for the little ones. As they look up in awe at you, seeing you as a god that you are, you left up your leg as high as you can to show the littles the sheer size of it. As soon as you see and hear their panic and begin to run away on foot and in their small metal things on wheel. You just smeared, because most them are still going to die. You then lower leg, inching it close to a building. You place you meaty padded sole at a base of tall thick building, feeling glass breaking under it, leaving you with but a tickle. You then apply pressure though your leg, to you foot, and to the building, and sure enough, it broke. You heard screams from the people who were inside the building as the severed piece began to fall to the streets below, causing other neighboring buildings to be crushed on under, as well as cover the road where the tiny were fleeing on, cursing the good lot of them. With their way out block, you raise their panic even more by moving your leg and have your foot shadow over them. Lusts of power exploded in your body as you hear the chorus of screams from the small ones as your foot, a small collection of your muscles in your entire body, closed in on them and bring about their deaths. You lower you foot on top of them slowly, so you can feel their futile struggle against your weight, flavoring in the rest of their scream, as you press your foot down. And then, you chuckled at the silence and warm gooey feeling between your toes.

But in your savoring of chaos, you are suddenly hit by something, something with a great force to place you on your knees. Feeling great rage as to someone to DARE challenge you in your moment of pleasure filled your eyes are you turn to see...
124.title: Leaving a mark in the city...

1243.content: Some navy seals? FBI? CIA?
1243.title: other

choices: Get to know the tiger better
Catch an airplane on the way
125.content:
Although you generally like to hunt alone, you decide to mix things up a bit. That tiger is kind of handsome. He's got a nice package for his size and is extremely muscular. His lust for destruction is similar to yours as seen in the way he mimicks you. You like how he has perfected using his sharp claws and fangs.

The semi-large city - if you could call it that - hasn't seen a macro before. Imagine their surprise when they are rampaged by two massive carnivores with a taste for blood and destruction. They will not know what hit them.

The tiger follows you around like a puppy, so you aren't surprised when he jumps at the opportunity. Actually, he is greatful. You notice the lust in his eyes as he stares at from your outrageously large padded feet to your ample meat. Pretending not to notice his learing, you adjust yourself which displays the goods even better.

You set up a plan to hit this city. You'll each approach from opposite sides. The city is surrounded on each side by a large river. By knocking down the four bridges, it will close off the main exits for a majority of the citizens. The next to go will be the airport. Then we can take our time to ravage at our leisure.
125.title: Invite the tiger

13.content:
You are a 65 foot anthro dragon walking down a busy street. Now, when you're a dragon that big, you tend to get noticed; so you wear a business shirt and jacket, to at least give a semblance of civility. It's not working, as many pedestrians are running around screaming.

After 30 minutes, you get tired of the chaos. You tried your best to look like one of them; you didn't think they knew how hard it was to find a shirt and jacket to fit you. The fury is building inside you. If they can't accept you, they deserve to die!!

How do you do that?
13.title: you are 65 foot of antho dragon, and your clothed

choices: Your stomach is begging you to fill it
Look at the tiny humans, and grin evilly
14.content: You are an anthro T-Rex, and you stand 50 feet tall. You thought "well, I'm huge now. So I suppose I can do what I want.
14.title: You An Anthro TRex, standing at 50 feet tall

choices: Just play with them in your mouth
142.content:
You grin evilly down at the humans.

What do you do?
142.title: Look at the tiny humans, and grin evilly

143.content:
"Okay, humans, if you want to live, massage my stinky claws!!"

What do the humans do?
143.title: Your feet need lovin'

choices: You commence wreaking havoc upon the city.
You decide to devour the city instead.
153.content:
You are an anthropomorphic baby T-Rex in this case Rep Phil. Your size stands at 100 ft tall and are also a giant wide load. "It's time to wreak havoc and eat everything in sight, bare butt naked style since I'm so huge". You thought to yourself.

You then start tearing your clothes apart, then you proceed to tear apart your Godzilla sized baggy diaper and contently sigh to yourself.

"Now that's more like it since we giant rampaging baby dinosaurs don't need to wear clothes or diapers because we can be free." You thought.
153.title: T-Rex

155.content:
I noticed the lack of free choices.... I hope the author doesn't mind....


So Brontosarus OR...
155.title: Brontosaurus

choices: Giant sized original characters it is.
1552.content: Okay since this is a free chapter and all that instead of dinosaurs perhaps you the reader would like to come up with your giant sized original characters or would you like to choose something else instead?
1552.title: Free Choice

15521.content:
You wake up feeling terrible, but still have your eyes closed. The morning sun hits you eyes and shift your head slightly and try to get more sleep.
Your bed feels really weird. You slowly open your eyes and you realize your outside and everything around you is tiny!

You sit up on your elbows while still laying down and look down at your body. Not only are you naked, but your body is covered in red... FUR!
Well almost, looking down at your chest which is covered in blonde fur, the same color as your hair. And looking down at your feet, um paws?
You have black fur covering from foreleg to toes. You give your toes an experimental wiggle.

Your thoughts are immediately interrupted by a sound behind you. Turning your head a trash can knocked while someone or something hides behind the house. Taking in your surroundings, your 160 feet tall, naked, and laying down in the middle of a two lane street in suburban neighborhood you don't recognize. Your feet are taking up someone's front yard across the street from you, while your back is has someone's house crushed underneath you. Looking to your left you, left hand is covered in black fur and crushed someone's car and you right hand is resting on your new appendage...

You have a fox tail!! You are a 160 foot something gingered fur, blonde hair/chest haired, nude anthropomorphic macro FOX in a suburban neighborhood!!

You have had enough of sitting a try to stand up. Drawing your knees toward you tear up concrete with you legs dragging across the ground.
You remember reading somewhere that your body should be collapsing under its own weight. (Physics be damned or your body is stronger and tougher than titanium) Standing up your feet leaves cracks in the asphalt. Looking out BIG you are compared to anything else you get an erection. Your gigantic pillar stands 20 feet long and proud. You wish there was a bus to compare to your bigness eventually decide to...
15521.title: 160 ft Fox

choices: Ask him where I could find something to eat.
155211.content:
Feeling big makes you horny. If only it wasn't morning maybe you could find some girls tanning or something.
Looking below you see the creature hiding behind the demolished house from earlier thanks to your new point of view. You take a step over the house into the house's backyard and the ground shakes. You take a moment to enjoy that and bend over pick up whomever it is below you. Rising up to your full height its anthropomorphic male bear. "I guess this world is full of furries," you thought.

Bear, "Please don't hurt me."

"Whoa it talks," you thought.
"I'm not going to hurt you I just want to know where I am," you say hoping to calm him down.

The bear stares at you blankly and you get impatient for an answer.
"Tell me where I am or I will change my mind about not hurting you," you say.

The bear squeaks and shouts to you that you are on Earth. You already knew that, but at least you know this would is called Earth and not Anthros or something. He probably assumes that your an alien, but then again you probably are.

Growing bored you suddenly get hungry. I guess it time for breakfast you then decide...
155211.title: Explore

choices: You had enough of this you eat him NOW!
1552112.content:
The bear looks at your stomach then at you looking more scared then ever. "Hey bear uh, where can I find some food?" you ask.

The bear just stays silent. "Tell me where I can find some food or I'll............... eat you...." you weren't series when you said that, but once you said you feel tempted to. The bear screams and says he doesn't know but then he remembers there is a BBQ happening around lunch time, but that's hours from now and your hungry NOW! Your grip tightens a little bit cutting off his circulation you try ask something else to think about other than hunger.

"Bear... what's your name?" you finally decide to ask and he says his name is Robert.
"Robert, how long was I lying asleep?" you ask.

He tells you that he found you outside after he threw away some expired milk. He said there was a beam of light from the sky and poof your back destroy his house. You stomach grumbles again demanding food...
1552112.title: Ask him where I could find something to eat.

info.brief_description: A Macro story, giant beasts aren't always the most freindly, but who knows.
info.description:
Life in a new world, everything you know is gone, perhaps everything you are is gone too, the world is strangly familer even though the rules have changed, things that should be are. Life for humans is no longer the epoch of the evolutionary lader, and the top creatures are themselves in conflict with eachother. A civilization might be established, but there are surly wild areas.. what fates will you discover?

Unless otherwise noted, the world is much the same as our own
info.pretty_title: Large and in charge, A macro interactive
